metadata.synopsis: A group of adventurers reconvene after spreading around in Wyrm's Crossing to buy supplies. They are in a rush to leave for neverwinter before the absolute arrives. This is the Half-Orc one liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -16; 51; -52- Talk to the Half-orc of the adventurer group.

0.speaker: Zog
0.text: Thought we'd get something steady here, but no coin is worth it - not with the Absolute breathing down our necks.

1.speaker: Zog
1.text: If you're after a job, Neverwinter is on the look-out for adventurers. That's where we're headed.
